channel.title: Custom interface, help
channel.description:
Hi, I've edited the old Game Options in my 317 Delta client to a different look. I have the split chat working, but can someone help/tell me how to get the run, energy, auto retaliate & combat level working.
(Used Lin's Interface Editor).
Thank you.
[img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/21d89l.jpg[/img]

item.title: Custom interface, help
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

im trying to add the same thing but in quest tab.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom interface, help
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:2, topic:518564”]combat level calculation is server sided I believe. Pretty sure same with run energy.[/quote]Yes, but servers can send a config value to the client or ignore how the client works and just send a string. There’s nothing wrong with that for small servers but it’s extra bandwidth. You know an interface is using a config value when you see -1 or -2 in place for the text.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom interface, help

item.description:
